title: MuscleMax Startup Project
description: Leading development of a React Native app integrated with a custom EMG device. Collaborating with a 5-person cross-functional team to design and implement backend architecture for real-time muscle activity tracking. EMAIL for Viewing Access

title: Data Blog
description: Conducting end-to-end data analysis using Python (Pandas, Seaborn, Tableau). Performing data cleaning, EDA, and model selection on public datasets. Publishing analyses demonstrating real-world insights in data science.

title: GitHub Data Fetcher
description: Developed a Rust CLI tool that interacts with the GitHub REST API to retrieve repository and issue metadata. Stored structured JSON objects in Redis for fast retrieval and caching, improving query efficiency and reducing API calls by 80%.

title: Top Garden Landscaping & Design
description: Built and deployed a responsive client website using React and Tailwind CSS. Improved client visibility and customer inquiries by 40% through optimized design. Applied agile communication and design iteration.
